title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 857.8 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 857.8 - Severability

State Regulations

Severability. If any provision of this Part or the
application thereof to any person or circumstance is held invalid, such
invalidity shall not affect other provisions or applications of this Part which
can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this
end the provisions of this Part are declared to be severable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
857.8

Adopted

New

York State Register March 20, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 12, eff. 3/20/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
